PN.content:
Please identify the "Property Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: In the PSCs community , poly(2,7-carbazole-altdithienylbenzothiadiazole) ( PCDTBT ) is one excellent exam - ple for a low HOMO ( -5.45 eV ) as required by the ' ideal ' πconjugated polymers , which led to a high V OC value over 0.8 V and outstanding stability against oxidation at high temperatures.

Let's think step by step.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material property" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Sure, here's the updated table with only the entities that clearly refer to material properties:

| Property Name |
| --- |
| HOMO |
| V OC |

The entities "HOMO" and "V OC" are both material properties that are relevant to the performance of the polymer described in the paragraph. "HOMO" refers to the highest occupied molecular orbital, which is a measure of the energy level at which electrons are occupied in a material, and "V OC" refers to the open-circuit voltage, which is a measure of the maximum voltage that can be generated by a solar cell under illumination.
